content.description:
Advertisement by Aeroflot, a Soviet State-Owned Commercial Airline. The Advertisement Was Used in the Soviet Union During the 1950s.

Shawshots/ Alamy Stock Photo

The image shows a commercial jetliner flying over major landmarks from America, Europe, Africa, and Asia.
content.question: In addition to its main use as advertising material, the image was most likely also intended to

choices.label: show the Soviet Union’s rise as a major technological power
demonstrate Soviet support for communist parties in Western European countries
encourage improved relations between the United States and the Soviet Union
facilitate the spread of communist ideas in East and Southeast Asia

content.answer: show the Soviet Union’s rise as a major technological power
